mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BMS_PROG_MST(PROG_CD, PROG_NM, PROG_GRP_CD, PROG_PH, USE_YN, REMARK, UPD_DTM, UPD_ID) VALUES (#{PROG_CD}, #{PROG_NM}, #{PROG_GRP_CD}, #{PROG_PH}, #{USE_YN}, #{REMARK}, #{UPD_DTM}, #{SSN_USER_ID})
mapper.select: SELECT P.PROG_CD, P.AUTH_CD, A.AUTH_NM, P.AUTH_CHECK, P.SCH_AH, P.SAV_AH, P.GEX_AH, P.IEX_AH, P.EXL_AH, P.DEL_AH , P.FN1_AH, P.FN2_AH, P.FN3_AH, P.FN4_AH, P.FN5_AH, P.FN6_AH, P.FN7_AH, P.FN8_AH, P.HELP_AH FROM BMS_PROG_AUTH_INFO P, BMS_AUTHORITY_MST A WHERE P.AUTH_CD = A.AUTH_CD AND P.PROG_CD = #{PROG_CD} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY AUTH_CD

SELECT AUTH_CD, AUTH_NM, REMARK FROM BMS_AUTHORITY_MST WHERE AUTH_CD NOT IN (SELECT AUTH_CD FROM BMS_PROG_AUTH_INFO WHERE PROG_CD = #{PROG_CD}) AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND (AUTH_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || AUTH_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%'))
AND AUTH_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND AUTH_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY AUTH_CD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BMS_PROG_AUTH_INFO(AUTH_CD, PROG_CD, AUTH_CHECK,SCH_AH,SAV_AH,GEX_AH,IEX_AH,EXL_AH,DEL_AH,FN1_AH, FN2_AH,FN3_AH,FN4_AH,FN5_AH,FN6_AH,FN7_AH,FN8_AH,HELP_AH, UPD_DTM, UPD_ID) VALUES (#{AUTH_CD}, #{PROG_CD}, #{AUTH_CHECK},#{SCH_AH},#{SAV_AH},#{GEX_AH},#{IEX_AH},#{EXL_AH},#{DEL_AH},#{FN1_AH},#{FN2_AH}, #{FN3_AH},#{FN4_AH},#{FN5_AH},#{FN6_AH},#{FN7_AH},#{FN8_AH},#{HELP_AH},#{UPD_DTM}, #{SSN_USER_ID})
